title: Adaptive path again
thumbnail: /static/assets/folk arts - arts council sfl photo by chris walters 10.jpg
body: What started as the world’s first UX firm has lived up to its name: Adaptive Path has evolved over the last dozen years to address the blurring of the digital/physical divide. They call it designing “[great human experiences](www.microsoft.com),” a compelling aspirational idea that represents a deep and diverse set of services. A brand refresh and a new website offered the opportunity to make this abstract concept crystal clear.
